member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionObserver
member.summary: dedicated to find cycles and properly aid in the type-loading of cyclical graphs.
member.remarks: Cycles are detected by analyzing the call stack. On the 2 pass algorithm, the first pass loads and caches until a cycle is found in the stack. The second pass connects the loaded pieces together.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionObserver.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: If allowCycle is set to false, throw an exception when detecting cycle.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionObserver.CycleDetectionPass
member.summary: Gets or sets the current pass of the algorithm.
member.value: The current pass of the algorithm.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionObserver.OnBeforeLoadToken``1(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Debugging.SourceContext,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Debugging.SourceRange,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,``0@)
member.summary: Notifies instances before type-loading a .
member.typeparam: Type of the concrete object to be built.
member.param: Source context for the current token.
Source range for the current token.
Token to be used to build the object.
Output parameter for observer to provide its result to the converter.
member.returns: True if the observer provides a result and False if not.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionObserver.OnAfterLoadToken``1(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Debugging.SourceContext,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Debugging.SourceRange,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken,``0,``0@)
member.summary: Notifies instances after type-loading a into the provided instance of .
member.typeparam: Type of the concrete object that was built.
member.param: Source context for the current token.
Source range for the current token.
Token used to build the object.
Object that was built using the token.
Output parameter for observer to provide its result to the converter.
member.returns: True if the observer provides a result and False if not.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionPasses
member.summary: Passes for the 2-pass cycle detection algorithm implemented in . This algorithm is used to detect cycles in Json type loading by the different converters registered by declarative components.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionPasses.PassOne
member.summary: First pass of the 2-pass cycle detection algorithm.
member.remarks: The first pass builds all objects and caches them, but stops processing branches whenever it finds a cycle.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.Dialogs.Declarative.Observers.CycleDetectionPasses.PassTwo
member.summary: Second pass of the 2-pass cycle detection algorithm.
member.remarks: The second pass takes all items from the cache, so there is no real serialization but mostly stitching objects together from the cache.

member.summary: Disposes objected used by the class.
member.param: A Boolean that indicates whether the method call comes from a Dispose method (its value is true) or from a finalizer (its value is false).
member.remarks: The disposing parameter should be false when called from a finalizer, and true when called from the IDisposable.Dispose method. In other words, it is true when deterministically called and false when non-deterministically called.
